EpilepsyGuidelines.PrePregnancy: Pre-pregnancy counseling should be offered to all women with epilepsy of childbearing age
EpilepsyGuidelines.FolicAcid: Folic acid supplementation (5mg daily) should be started before conception
EpilepsyGuidelines.MedicationOptimization: Anti-epileptic drug therapy should be optimized before pregnancy
EpilepsyGuidelines.Monitoring: Regular monitoring of AED levels during pregnancy is essential
